id: California wildfires kill 31 and more than 200 missing
paragraph: The death toll in wildfires raging across California rose to at least 31, with another 200 people recorded as missing, as three sprawling blazes burnt homes and property, forced the evacuation of hundreds of thousands of people and destroyed an entire town.Footage courtesy of Reuters.Officials warn high winds on Monday will fuel blazes and make containment difficultMeet the researchers behind the next wave of military robots Residents told to stay indoors with air quality worse than New DelhiThe FT's James Blitz on the breakaway documentUK prime minister's address comes after cabinet resignationsTheresa May finally struck a Brexit deal this week, but it did not please much of her Conservative party with two Cabinet ministers resigning. Will Mrs May survive? Meet the researchers behind the next wave of military robots The FT's Robert Shrimsley says Conservatives looking like an anarchist fringeResidents told to stay indoors with air quality worse than New DelhiInternational Edition
